entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
